about_the_game:
Become a Super Hockey Baller! Take your ball through a variety of skills challenges, each more difficult than the last. Learn to shoot with accuracy and control the ball like a pro. A pro what? A pro something. Don't worry about it. Just get out there, destroy those targets, and collect some coins. Coins are important. You can tell they're important because they're shiny and they give you points.

So, go! Go be whatever a Super Hockey Baller is. We don't know. This is a game about hitting a ball with a stick. Invent your own narrative!

Need some help with the game? Or just looking for more info?
Come hang out with us on

Features

  • Hit a Ball with a Stick!
  • Unique Locomotion
  • Semi-Regular Updates
  • There are like 5 total VR hockey games. You have no choice.
  • Explosions

name: Super Hockey Ball

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7-6700k
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Street hockey in virtual reality! Super Hockey Ball is an explosive, physics-based, sports/adventure experience. Hit a ball. Earn points. Be a superstar!
